评论详情: Shorter than I thought it would be but I made it work!

i bought the pink and white striped shirt for 14.99 and personally, i expect a 15 dollar tank top to be a bit better quality than this! it’s super duper thin and for the price you’d expect a lot better
Material is good, comfy, cute, like the picture

Super cute top, i usually wear an xs and the xs fit perfectly. It’s straps were a great length and the shirt came down to the bottom of my rib cage. Unfortunately it was insanely itchy, however, I do have sensitive skin so that may not be an issue for others. Sadly, I will be sending it back and continuing to search for something a tad bit softer.
